Package abyss.plugin.api

Class Abyss

java.lang.Object
abyss.plugin.api.Abyss
public final class Abyss extends Object
Provides access to Abyss itself.

    • loadNewPlugin

      public static PluginContext loadNewPlugin(Class<?> entry)
      Loads a new plugin into the client.
      Parameters:
      entry - The entry-point of the plugin to load.
      Returns:
      The context of the loaded plugin.

    • getPluginDirBinary

      public static byte[] getPluginDirBinary()
      Retrieves the path to the plugin directory.
      Returns:
      The path to the plugin directory.

    • getPluginDir

      public static String getPluginDir()
      Retrieves the path to the plugin directory.
      Returns:
      The path to the plugin directory.

    • protection

      public static Object protection(int id, Object[] args)
      Performs a call into the protection subsystem. Documentation will not be provided for this system. This will be used internally, and in bundled plugins such as the SDN to provide increased protection for paid products which cannot be provided in pure Java.

      Calls into this function will not work unless the calling jar is signed.

      Parameters:
      id - The protection id.
      args - The protection arguments.
      Returns:
      The protection result.

    • focusGameWindow

      public static void focusGameWindow()
      Brings the game window into focus.

    • toggleRendering

      public static void toggleRendering(boolean enabled)
      Toggles rendering on or off.
      Parameters:
      enabled - If rendering will be on or off.

    • setRenderDelay

      public static void setRenderDelay(int renderDelay)
      Changes the delay between rendering each frame of the game.
      Parameters:
      renderDelay - The new render delay.

    • toggleAutoLogin

      public static void toggleAutoLogin(boolean enabled)
      Toggles the auto login feature.
      Parameters:
      enabled - If auto login should be enabled or disabled.

    • takeBreak

      public static void takeBreak(long ms)
      Forces Kraken to take a break right now.
      Parameters:
      ms - The number of milliseconds to take a break for.

    • getRestartCount

      public static int getRestartCount()
      Retrieves the number of times the client has been restarted in this session (due to crashes, etc.) This can be useful for determining if you should initialize persistent data in your plugin.

    • isNewSession

      public static boolean isNewSession()
      Determines if this is a new session. Useful for initializing variables in plugins related to runtime, experience, etc.

    • getAllPlugins

      public static PluginContext[] getAllPlugins()
      Retrieves the context of each plugin loaded into the client currently.
      Returns:
      Each plugin loaded into the client currently.

    • getPluginByName

      public static PluginContext getPluginByName(String name)
      Finds a plugin with a specific name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to search for.
      Returns:
      The found plugin, or NULL if one does not exist.

    • getSdnUsername

      public static byte[] getSdnUsername()
      Retrieves the username of the currently running Kraken account. May not always be valid.

    • getSdnPassword

      public static byte[] getSdnPassword()
      Retrieves the password of the currently running Kraken account. May not always be valid.

    • getDisplayNameBinary

      public static byte[] getDisplayNameBinary()
      Retrieves the email of the currently running account.

    • getDisplayName

      public static String getDisplayName()
      Retrieves the email of the currently running account.

    • getRandomizeWorldLoginType

      public static WorldType getRandomizeWorldLoginType()
      Retrieves the method to use for randomizing world selection on login. NULL = disabled.
      Returns:
      The method to use for randomizing the world on login.

    • setRandomizeWorldLoginType

      public static void setRandomizeWorldLoginType(WorldType type)
      Changes the method to use for randomizing world selection on login. NULL = disabled.
      Parameters:
      type - The new method to use for randomizing the world on login.

    • getLoginWorld

      public static int getLoginWorld()
      Retrieves the world being selected on login.
      Returns:
      The world to set when logging in.

    • setLoginWorld

      public static void setLoginWorld(int world)
      Changes the world being selected on login.
      Parameters:
      world - The new world to set when logging in.

    • getStaticRngSeed

      public static int getStaticRngSeed(int mutations)
      Retrieves a seed that can be used for RNG that will be the same every time this specific account runs.
      Parameters:
      mutations - The number of mutations to apply to the seed. Can be used to retrieve different seeds for each plugin.
      Returns:
      The seed to use for RNG.

    • setStatus

      public static void setStatus(String status)
      Sets the status that will be displayed on the Kraken loader. This should only be used by primary plugins that will take control of the client.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to display in the loader.

    • getIntroConfiguration

      public static int getIntroConfiguration()
      Retrieves the introspection configuration bitmask.
      Returns:
      The introspection configuration bitmask.
